sentences.sContent: Along the Rh ? ne Valley, occasional strong , cold , dry , north - to - northwesterly wind known as the mistral .
sentences.sContent_eng: Along the Rh ? ne Valley, occasional strong , cold , dry , north - to - northwesterly wind known as the mistral .
sentences.sCn: 罗讷山谷沿线偶尔会出现从北部吹响西北的干冷的强风。

sentences.sContent: When the mistral blew in winter, the view past Cannes revealed the peaks of Corsica; the coal stove in the kitchen yielded little hot water or heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the mistral blew in winter, the view past Cannes revealed the peaks of Corsica; the coal stove in the kitchen yielded little hot water or heat.
sentences.sCn: 冬天，地中海干冷的北风呼啸而过，一过戛纳，就可以望见科西嘉岛的群峰了。 小屋厨房中的煤炉几乎没有热气，也热不了水。

remMethod.val: mist(雾) + ral → 风起雾散 → 寒冷且干燥的强风

trans.tranOther: a strong cold dry wind that blows through the Rhône valley and S France to the Mediterranean coast, mainly in the winter
